name: react-admin
description: A frontend Framework for building admin applications on top of REST services, using ES6, React and Material UI

scripts.build: rimraf ./lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --quiet ./src -d ./lib --ignore spec.js,test.js
scripts.build-esm: rimraf ./esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel --quiet ./src -d ./esm --ignore spec.js,test.js
